channel.title: Need Help with main menu

item.title: Need Help with main menu
item.dc:creator: @jtsou jtsou
item.description:
@jtsou wrote:

Any help please?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2008, 06:49:55 PM[/size][hr][code]
String owner = “Mememe”;
String LU = “Elemental Armor”;
String Rep = “”+reputation;
sendQuest("~~~ MEMEME ~~~", 15950);
sendQuest(“Admins: MeMeMe, “, 15960);
sendQuest(“Moderators: “, 15961);
sendQuest(””, 15962);
sendQuest(“News:”, 15963);
sendQuest(””, 15964);
sendQuest(“Perfect rings have been degraded”, 15965);
sendQuest(“Shops updated”, 15966);
sendQuest("", 15955);
sendQuest("", 15956);
sendQuest("", 15957);
sendQuest("", 15958);

showInterface(15944);
}
[/code]

Thats what i have now, and all that shows up is admins[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2008, 07:24:51 PM[/size][hr]Can someone tell me how i could get the old style menus instead of these? they are a lot easier

item.title: Need Help with main menu
item.dc:creator: @hootywooty hootywooty
item.description:
@hootywooty wrote:

if this is kinda what you want its just a start though. What this will do it make the word Admin and Moderators line up perfectly vertical.

sendQuest("Admins", 15960);
sendQuest("Moderators", 15961);

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with main menu
